column1: Copied to main database by Kim

column44: RHL no waves at collection site but waves breaking starting halfway to Lipoa Point, light rain the night before
RKV duplicate nutrient sample. 2 syringes from same bucket. N-1 with 0.7 um filter, N-2 with 0.2 um filter, light rain the night before

huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, lightening, winds - power outages all over Maui, some stream flow, lots of debris in water, some of it looks like pieces of bark, stems, duplicate nutrient sample. 2 syringes from same bucket. N-1 with 0.2  um filter, N-2 with 0.7 um filter

huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, no stream flow while taking sample but was water in both stream beds and ocean waves mixed a little with stream water at mouth of stream
huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, lots of wood debris in water
huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui
huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, lots of wood debris in water

huge rain storm Mon night (10/23) with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, was water in stream bed though no stream flow while taking sample but ocean mixed a little with stream water at mouth of stream
Honolua sampling during heavy rain, stream flowing into ocean, double rainbox within the bay, saw bark, leaves, and large particles in otherwise clear water - may have caused the high NTU numbers
small flow from stream into ocean
RKO no water coming out of pipe
RKV waves irregular, turbulent but not that large, rocks exposed at about 1 foot underwater made for difficult footing even with reef shoes
